lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: Others believed in me many years ago, and helped me to get started in business.  I believe in the honesty and hard work of people and am thankful that my loans can help others to improve their lives and the lives of their families.  I believe in entrepreneurship, which enables people to do things for themselves-- but it also helps to create new jobs and strengthen local economies.  I love the Kiva concept and the insightful way they bring people together.  The idea of people borrowing from other people in order to accomplish something better and more powerful is what the information age is truly all about!
lenders.occupational_info: I own an information technology consulting firm that I started many years ago.  We help governments and businesses to make their computer networks to run more efficiently and more securely.  I work from my home in the mountains of north Georgia, plus I travel, mostly to Washington, DC and the Middle East.   I am a husband, father of 4 grown children, and grandfather.  I am active in my local church and volunteer with the local Boy Scouts of America and the Georgia Wing of the Civil Air Patrol.

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that the essence of change begins with the individual.  For me, food is life.  It can bring joy, summon emotions, and heal pain.  I work in the restaurant industry because I express myself with food.  Since I am lucky enough to enjoy bountiful food, since my life is filled with wonderful flavors, the least I can do is bring that to others.  Though I will loan to anyone, I am particularly focused on restaurants and food sales, as this is my passion as well.  It is my hope that these loans will bring food to more and more people.  Each restaurant or store we fund brings tastes, smells, and nourishment to their areas.  I also hope to focus on advancement for women with my lending.  Live well and enjoy!

lenders.name: Kalinaw Mindanao
lenders.whereabouts: cagayan de oro city Misamis Oriental
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others ans spread the good news about peace.
lenders.occupational_info: Kalinaw Mindanao Movement, Inc. (KMMI) is a CHILDREN, YOUTH AND CITIZEN FOR PEACE ACTION,– a Human Rights, Environment and Peace building advocacy concentrated mainly on Interfaith (religious studies and dialogue) and Culture of Peace, a missionary of the love of GOD and an ambassador of peace, non profit, non stock, non sectarian and non-government organization (NGO). This organization is primarily operated by the students, youth, young professionals and assisted by individual donors. KMMI CYC FOR PEACE ACTION is a workshop-seminars base organization. The fundamental concepts of the organization are taken from the Christian, Islam, Buddhist and Indigenous belief (referred to Lumads ) principles. Since the Organization is strictly non-sectarian, we do not engage with conversion of faith and religion. Also, K-Mindanao response the call of the Philippine Government under the Presidential Proclamation 127, S.2001 which sets the last Thursday of November to the first Wednesday of December as the Mindanao Week of Peace. To actively response to the call in celebration with Mindanao Week of Peace we must first enlighten and impart the peace and development education to the future leaders –Children and Youth.

We are Israeli. We are four right now. Nurit, Amots, Ruti, Yaacov.
Nurit is giving the loans through Kiva, the others give money but have no time or computer skills, so I -Nurit, am giving in their names. I am 42, married, 2 children, I am handicapped, ussing a wheelchair, so I get my living as a pension from the government (Israel).
I was born in a kibbutz and believe that people should get a chance.
since I am lucky and have everything I need, I am grateful to KIVA and to all the entrepreneurs for giving me a chance to give and to be on the helping side (being handicapped, i know what it means to get help when you need it)

lenders.loan_because: My vision and mision is to provide recording service in the cheapest way so every talent can be recorded in our country. Most of the time, only some fancy rich boy with no talent at all can make a records while those who is not just sitting wasting their great talent without having any opportunity to let people hear or see in wide point of view. and for the quality of our product it become more critical for us to get more money to boost up from the standard recording equipment to a better one. While world of recording become more advanced then to make recording with a great result is more cheaper and fast and convinient way become possible because it's in digital way.
lenders.occupational_info: Me and My friend running a very small home recording studio but we do pay attention to the quality of our product so it will not end up in thrash can. Both of us start with ZERO money and only have a good will and hard work to get to this point where we can have a small home studio for recording. so basically we do the recording, arrangement, mixing and master, all in one package.

lenders.occupational_info:
Cook foodstuffs according to menus, special dietary or nutritional restrictions, and numbers of portions to be served.

Clean and inspect galley equipment, kitchen appliances, and work areas in order to ensure cleanliness and functional operation.

Direct activities of one or more workers who assist in preparing and serving meals.

Bake breads, rolls, and other pastries.

Clean, cut, and cook meat, fish, and poultry.

Compile and maintain records of food use and expenditures.

Determine meal prices based on calculations of ingredient prices.

Requisition food supplies, kitchen equipment, and appliances, based on estimates of future needs.

Apportion and serve food to facility residents, employees, or patrons.

Monitor menus and spending in order to ensure that meals are prepared economically.

Monitor use of government food commodities to ensure that proper procedures are followed.

Plan menus that are varied, nutritionally balanced, and appetizing, taking advantage of foods in season and local availability.

Take inventory of supplies and equipment.

Train new employees.

Wash pots, pans, dishes, utensils, and other cooking equipment

lenders.occupational_info: I work with great books and wonderful people every day.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to, and it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make software for computers.

lenders.name: L. Matthew
lenders.loan_because: There but for the grace of God go I.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: these people are doing great things, and it is a privilege to be able to help out a little bit

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Helping others to become self-sufficient is the highest form of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Jewish seminary student

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.occupational_info: We make textbooks. Our work includes writing, drawing artwork, choosing photos, and designing books for students from kindergarten to college.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: it works!
lenders.occupational_info: Doc

lenders.name: Elle Jae Weddings
lenders.loan_because: Because we want life to be better for everyone on Earth.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a husband and wife photography team based in San Francisco, California (but happily traveling anywhere else : )

lenders.name: Tonja
lenders.loan_because: I believe in social justice and humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: My agency matches volunteers with an older person who is homebound in order to increase socialization and decrease isolation among the elderlyl

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I want to.   I'm from the Philippines originally and have seen first hand how a little bit of money and trust can go a very long way ;)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a school librarian in New York City.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept!

lenders.name: Shama
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Schooley
lenders.loan_because: I believe that every person should be given an opportunity to better their life, and helping someone through Kiva is a tangible way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Seattle Pacific University, I will graduate this spring with a degree in Business Management, after graduation I hope to start a business of my own.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: Now you have touched my life and I have touched yours.  Now we are neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and analyze electronic systems.

lenders.name: Kaylee
lenders.loan_because: I believe people with good ideas who want to work hard and improve their lives and their communities through ingenuity and dedication to their crafts deserve a chance to thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I invite community members to make an investment through my university in solving complex 21st-century problems, creating new knowledge, and improving the lives of students. I raise money for faculty research and teaching, and for scholarships and fellowships for students.

lenders.name: Alandis
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected as one.
lenders.occupational_info: Movement of material from one place to another (Transportation)
